about_the_game:
Christmas Mosaic Puzzle is an exciting puzzle game with a winter holiday theme! The time for Christmas wonders and gifts begins with Christmas Mosaic Puzzle!

Assemble unusual puzzles – 120 colorful mosaics that are fun for all ages! Challenge yourself – each level is more difficult than the last, but has to be completed within the time limit! Or enable untimed mode in the game settings and enjoy the game using hints.

Christmas Mosaic Puzzle is a true winter fairy tale! Santa Claus is giving you 120 unique mosaics made of various materials: wood, cloth, paper, stone, metal, glass and precious stones.

The winter holidays are the theme of each mosaic: preparations for Christmas and the New Year, holiday traditions, time at home with the family, the beauty of nature in winter, gifts, a beautiful Christmas tree, tasty treats and a truly magical atmosphere. Get away from the hubbub of daily life and enjoy colorful mosiacs with Christmas Mosaic Puzzle!

name: Christmas Mosaic Puzzle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP3 x64
  • Processor: 1500 MHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 265 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2000 MHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 265 MB available space

short_description: The time for winter wonders begins with Christmas Mosaic Puzzle! 120 unique and exciting puzzles for any age!
